programme.title: Panda and Krash S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Slippery Floor - The toys wake up to find themselves somewhere else other than the demonstration zone.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep38

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep39

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Tato Tower Takeover - Evil Pea takes over the Tato Tower HQ and uses Carrot's new security system to keep Supertato out. Supertato and Carrot work on a cunning ice cream plan to sneak back in.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep8

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep10

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep8
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Adesanya vs. Imavov
programme.desc: Prelims - The Octagon is back in Riyadh, Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, on February 1 for a UFC Fight Night event featuring the return of a former middleweight champion with his sights on regaining his crown. But before Israel Adesanya gears up for a title run, he has to get by surging contender Nassourdine Imavov. One of the most dominant champions of his era, Adesanya aims to get his 2025 campaign off to a winning start against Imavov, who has won three in a row leading up to the biggest fight of his career. In the co-main event, Middleweight sensation Shara Bullet Magomedov faces off with veteran star Michael Venom Page in a showdown of elite strikers.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Adesanya vs. Imavov
programme.desc: Main Event - The Octagon is back in Riyadh, Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, on February 1 for a UFC Fight Night event featuring the return of a former middleweight champion with his sights on regaining his crown. But before Israel Adesanya gears up for a title run, he has to get by surging contender Nassourdine Imavov. programme.title: UFC 311: Makhachev vs. Tsarukyan 2
programme.desc: Prelims - UFCs first visit to Intuit Dome in Inglewood, California, on January 19 will be a star-studded one, featuring two highly anticipated championship bouts. programme.title: LIVE: UFC 312: Du Plessis vs. Strickland 2
programme.desc: Prelims - UFC returns down under to Sydney, Australia on February 9, and all eyes will be on Qudos Bank Arena when middleweight champion Dricus Du Plessis defends his crown against the man he took it from, Sean Strickland, in the main event of UFC 312. The first time this pair met last January, it was one of the best fights of 2024 as Du Plessis defeated Strickland by a narrow split decision. Now theyll run it back in Sydney. Plus, dominant strawweight champion Zhang Weili will put her belt on the line against unbeaten Tatiana Suarez in a highly anticipated title fight.

Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep13
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC301PantojavsErceg
programme.desc: UFC flyweight champion Alexandre Pantoja returns home to Brazil to defend his crown for the second time against surging Australian contender Steve Erceg in the main event, and Hall-of-Fame legend Jose Aldo comes out of retirement to face rapidly rising phenom Jonathan Martinez. Plus, Anthony "Lionheart" Smith vs Vitor Petrino and much more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: UFC 312: Du Plessis vs. Strickland 2
programme.desc: Prelims - UFC returns down under to Sydney, Australia on February 9, and all eyes will be on Qudos Bank Arena when middleweight champion Dricus Du Plessis defends his crown against the man he took it from, Sean Strickland, in the main event of UFC 312. The first time this pair met last January, it was one of the best fights of 2024 as Du Plessis defeated Strickland by a narrow split decision. Now theyll run it back in Sydney. Plus, dominant strawweight champion Zhang Weili will put her belt on the line against unbeaten Tatiana Suarez in a highly anticipated title fight.
